ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: They deff pay more for enchanted.  The min buying price of an item and the max selling price of an item, as you know, has some dependency on your charisma.
ygData.messageBody:
They deff pay more for enchanted.  The min buying price of an item and the max selling price of an item, as you know, has some dependency on your charisma.  What you may not know is those 2 numbers (charisma numbers) are not the same.  I think, not positive, that min buying price with indifferent faction is 115 charisma.  But max selling is much higher than that.
 
Teenimu
Enchanter 53 Season
Tunare Server
 
And I just made last night Muson 7th lvl Rogue Rallos Zek server.  Anyone here play on RZ? If you do and would like to work out some trade for a starter set of gear on a blue server, Tunare, for a set of gear or anything for that matter on Rallos Zek I would really appreciate it.  Let me know.
-----Original Message-----
From: Mindseye [mailto:mindseye@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 8:40 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelry

If you're just selling it to the vendor you don't have to enchant the metal, they pay the same enchanted or not or at least they do for me.
----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaardr, FC3
To: 'eqenchanters@egroups.com'
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 12:27 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Jewelry


Well, last night I decided to see how hard it is to train Jewlcraft After
200. (skill was 201 went up making some jewelry for a friend.) So from 201
to 206 how much money do you think I lost? Actually nothing.  I made some
money, I enchanted every bar and I was making money selling it back to
vendor (vendor bought gold ruby rings back for 147pp and some change, cost
131p and change 10p and change for the gem and bar respectively) So I made
about 5p of each one.  I didn't keep track of 201 to 203 but from 203 to 206
I made 240 Gold Ruby Rings selling them all back to the vendor, I think I
failed 6 times.  While I was making these I would /auction some of the 4int
2str earrings and 4str 2int earrings.  Dont like to mess with plat to order.
The only time I do plat is when I loot some Fire Opals and then just try my
luck.  Anyone else trying to raise it past 200?  I know Plat malachite is
cheaper each attempt but the mana to enchant the bars was killing me ( I
tried 20 with no increases).

Any ideas, Suggestions, or Experiences here?

Teenimu
Enchanter Tunare Server
53 Season

Btw my int was 213 while doing these.
And wisdom of below 100 not sure what it was.  But I don't believe in the
wisdom theory. I think Abashi on one of his recent posts dispelled this.
Unless your a wisdom based caster/player then your skill goes off this.
-----Original Message-----
From: Douglas S. Reilly [mailto:dreilly@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 3:10 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelry


Heh, haven't we all tried this?   Thing is, once you reach a certain skill
level (I think 21), it
says in all red "You must learn advanced skills in this trade" which means
you gotta do it the hard
way.  Do the stein quest 50,000 times to fund your training like the rest of
us did, and earn 'dem
stripes =)


:::dr:::
aka Horchata Sabrosa
